snippet: Mr. Curson, a trumpeter who worked with mainstays and mavericks of jazz as well as leading his own bands, came of age during a time of seismic change in the form.
abstract: Ted Curson, trumpeter who made a name both as a leader and a sideman to jazz greats, dies at age 77.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Curson, a trumpeter who worked with mainstays and mavericks of jazz as well as leading his own bands, came of age during a time of seismic change in the form.

headline.seo: Ted Curson, Jazz Trumpeter Who Upheld and Explored Form, Dies at 77
headline.main: Ted Curson, Trumpeter of the New and the Blue, Dies at 77
headline.print_headline: Ted Curson, 77, Trumpeter Of the New and the Blue
